00056 using std::string;

00058 enum LogLevel { Trace=0, Debug=1, Info=2, Error=3, Fatal=4 };

00070     int           level,
00071     const string& module,

00080 /* logging with std::string */
00081 #define RDK_LOG(level, message) \
00082     { Logging::log_message(     \
00083         level,                  \
00084         LOGGING_MODULE,         \
00085         __FILE__,               \
00086         __LINE__,               \
00087         __FUNCTION__,           \
00088         __PRETTY_FUNCTION__,    \
00089         message);               \
00090     }
00091 
00092 /* printf-style macros */
00093 #define RDK_PRINTF(level, format, args...) \
00094     { Logging::log_message(     \
00095         level,                  \
00096         LOGGING_MODULE,         \
00097         __FILE__,               \
00098         __LINE__,               \
00099         __FUNCTION__,           \
00100         __PRETTY_FUNCTION__,    \
00101         format , ## args  );    \
00102     }
00103 
00104 /* stream oriented macros */
00105 #define RDK_STREAM(level, stream_expr) \
00106     {                           \
00107         std::ostringstream oss; \
00108         oss << stream_expr;     \
00109         Logging::log_message(   \
00110         level,                  \
00111         LOGGING_MODULE,         \
00112         __FILE__,               \
00113         __LINE__,               \
00114         __FUNCTION__,           \
00115         __PRETTY_FUNCTION__,    \
00116         oss.str() );            \
00117     }
00118 
00119 #define RDK_TRACE_PRINTF(format, args...)  RDK_PRINTF(Logging::Trace, format , ## args)
00120 #define RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF(format, args...)  RDK_PRINTF(Logging::Debug, format , ## args)
00121 #define  RDK_INFO_PRINTF(format, args...)  RDK_PRINTF(Logging:: Info, format , ## args)
00122 #define RDK_ERROR_PRINTF(format, args...)  RDK_PRINTF(Logging::Error, format , ## args)
00123 
00124 #define RDK_TRACE_STREAM(expr ) RDK_STREAM(Logging::Trace, expr)
00125 #define RDK_DEBUG_STREAM(expr ) RDK_STREAM(Logging::Debug, expr)
00126 #define  RDK_INFO_STREAM(expr ) RDK_STREAM(Logging:: Info, expr)
00127 #define RDK_ERROR_STREAM(expr ) RDK_STREAM(Logging::Error, expr)
00128 
00129 } // namespace Logging
00130 
00131 #endif
